purpose: Provide a library of Jupyter notebooks to facilitate AI model development and experimentation
principle: Offers pre-built Jupyter notebooks that demonstrate various AI and machine learning techniques
reusability: Notebooks can be adapted for different datasets and AI models, promoting learning and experimentation
limitations: Primarily educational; not optimized for production use or large-scale deployment
name: cookbook
highlight: Comprehensive collection of Jupyter notebooks for AI model training and experimentation
